import React, { useState } from "react"; import inputHelper from "../../Helper/inputHelper"; const bookData = { Name: "", Description: "", CreatedBy: "", AuthorId: "", CategoryId: "", }; function BookUpsert() { const [bookInputs, setBookInputs] = useState(bookData); const handleBookInput = ( e: React.ChangeEvent< HTMLInputElement | HTMLSelectElement | HTMLTextAreaElement > ) => { const tempData = inputHelper(e, bookInputs); setBookInputs(tempData); }; const handleFileChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent) => { } return (

); } export default BookUpsert;
